name: Plan.Inc
description:
Plan.Inc is a game about delivery planning. You manage one truck, that must deliver several parcels. Each time a customer is delivered, it yields a reward, but using the truck has a cost. Your objective is to maximize your benefits and minimize the time required to deliver all the parcels. 

This game has been realized during the Scientific Game Jam 2023, and it is inspired by a thesis subject about bi-objective optimization. Bi-objective problems deal with the simultaneous optimization of two conflicting objectives. Solving such problems lead to many solutions with different trade-offs for each objective. The game represents how hard it is to optimize such a problem.
